bill.title: School facilities; authorize capital leases and build-to-suit capital leases for.
bill.description: An Act To Authorize A Local School Board To Enter Into A Capital Lease Or Build-to-suit Lease With A Private Developer For The Purpose Of Acquiring Or Constructing School Facilities; To Define Certain Terms; To Limit The Terms Of Such Leases To 40 Years; To Require School Boards To Advertise Its Intent To Enter Into A Capital Lease Or Build-to-suit Lease And To Take Certain Actions Before Entering Into Such Leases; To Authorize A School Board To Transfer Property To A Private Developer For The Construction, Repair Or Renovation Of A School Facility Under A Build-to-suit Capital Lease; To Amend Section 31-7-13, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Exempt Build-to-suit Capital Leases With A Private Developer From The State Bid Laws; And For Related Purposes.
